amendment.description: Relative to the relocation of the U.S. Olympic Committee's principal office and national headquarters.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1767 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 1767 proposed by Senator Burns for Senator Campbell. (consideration: CR S11870; text: CR S11870) Relative to the relocation of the U.S. Olympic Committee's principal office and national headquarters.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1767 proposed by Senator Burns for Senator Campbell.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 1767 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
